bio: I recently completed a certificate in full stack web development from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. I also have a Bachelor of Business degree from East Carolina University.
bio1: My tenacity and work ethic have afforded me the opportunity to prove myself and be successful in some of the most competitive cities in the United States. I have previously held the role of Senior Sales Associate at Sid Mashburn, Washington DC and subsequently Sales Manager at Drakeâ€™s, New York City.
bio2: The impact of COVID 19 on the retail industry in Manhattan has resulted in my decision to pivot towards a technical career where I can transfer the soft skills that i have mastered in the clothing industry that are also needed to be successful in the tech world. I have a demonstrated history in understanding requirements, working collaboratively and motivating teams in order to exceed goals ahead of schedule. I look forward to applying these skills in order to be part of a team driven to develop responsive user friendly applications.
